titleStmt.title: A true copy of a popish vvill made in the xixth. year of King Henry the Eighth, &c. The original whereof, with the probate, may be seen at the sign of the Bull in the Mint, Southwark, in the custody of Mr. Merrial; and published onely to set forth the ignorance of the papists.
titleStmt.author: Cony, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
